verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it,

And say <S%H559><s%> unto it, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> O mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> thee, and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee most desolate. <S%H8077><s%> <S%H4923><s%>

I will lay <S%H7760><s%> thy cities <S%H5892><s%> waste, <S%H2723><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt be <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> thou hast had <S%H1961><s%> a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> hatred, <S%H342><s%> and hast shed <S%H5064><s%> the blood of <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the force <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their calamity, <S%H343><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> that their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> had an end: <S%H7093><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I will prepare <S%H6213><s%> thee unto blood, <S%H1818><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee: sith <S%H518><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> hated <S%H8130><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> even blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee.

Thus will I make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> most desolate, <S%H8077><s%> <S%H8077><s%> and cut off <S%H3772><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it him that passeth out <S%H5674><s%> and him that returneth. <S%H7725><s%>

And I will fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> his mountains <S%H2022><s%> with his slain <S%H2491><s%> men: in thy hills, <S%H1389><s%> and in thy valleys, <S%H1516><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> thy rivers, <S%H650><s%> shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> that are slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee perpetual <S%H5769><s%> desolations, <S%H8077><s%> and thy cities <S%H5892><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> return: <S%H3427><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> thou hast said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H853><s%> These two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and these two <S%H8147><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> mine, and we will possess <S%H3423><s%> it; whereas the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I will even do <S%H6213><s%> according to thine anger, <S%H639><s%> and according to thine envy <S%H7068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast used <S%H6213><s%> out of thy hatred <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8135><s%> against them; and I will make myself known <S%H3045><s%> among them, when <S%H834><s%> I have judged <S%H8199><s%> thee.

And thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and that I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy blasphemies <S%H5007><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken <S%H559><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> They are laid desolate, <S%H8074><s%> they are given <S%H5414><s%> us to consume. <S%H402><s%>

Thus with your mouth <S%H6310><s%> ye have boasted <S%H1431><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and have multiplied <S%H6280><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me: I <S%H589><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> them.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> When the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> rejoiceth, <S%H8055><s%> I will make <S%H6213><s%> thee desolate. <S%H8077><s%>

As thou didst rejoice <S%H8057><s%> at the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> it was desolate, <S%H8074><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee: thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> O mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Idumea, <S%H123><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> of it: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
